articles.description: Neymar has his contracted at Saudi Pro League side Al-Hilal terminated by mutual consent, amid a reported move back to Santos.

articles.description: Rory McIlroy is fully focused on trying to knock off two of his remaining three career goals in 2025, writes Iain Carter.

articles.description: Six-time NBA All-Star Jimmy Butler is suspended indefinitely by the Miami Heat after a "continued pattern of disregard of team rules".

articles.description: Former Premier League referee David Coote has said he hid his sexuality during his career, fearing the abuse he would receive for being gay.
articles.title: David Coote: Former referee hid sexuality for fear of abuse
